column2: Ooof, not sure what you're looking for! Use /help to get the full list of commands.

${PREFIX}${command} ${name} reward: ${reward} ${completed}
Your ETH address is ${ethAdress}. To set new address use: /eth YOUR_ETH_ADDRESS
You address ${ethAdress} is accepted, to change it use: /eth your_eth_addr example: /eth 0x5B31Bb52bdd7006ae57F9d9506c0FF995229b63c
The address doesn't seem right. Any chance you put in your BTC address? My transfers are limited to ETH network and addresses containing 20 symbols
https://github.com/HyperLootProtocol/Starter-Pack/wiki/Bounty-FAQ
You can get all of the questions answered in the Discord chat here: https://discord.gg/qEH8PHk, but first check out the FAQ page:https://github.com/HyperLootProtocol/Starter-Pack/wiki/Bounty-FAQ
Hey, ${username}

get the list of terms & conditions for payments
Follow us on Twitter https://twitter.com/Hyperloot re-tweet the pinned message, stay subscribed till the end of the year. Will be checked automatically.
You earned your Twitter Bounty. Awesome! Move to the next bounty,  use /list to see what you can do.
I'm  unable to record the accomplishment of your Bounty.  You need to follow us AND retweet pin message. Please do it and check again.  use /support to explain us your situation, we will try to help
Follow us on LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/company/hyperloot/ and i will write you soon.
Got it, you on the right way to get maximum reward, you will recieve on your /balance, check your progress on /list command

I could not verify your LinkedIn bounty. You need to follow us on Linkedin AND send us valid user name that you are following us from. If you send us a random user name, you will not get qualified. If problems continue, use /support to explain us your situation, we will try to help
Join our Telegram Channel and stay with us till the end of the year to you get the bounty.
Congratulations. You earned your Telegram bounty. Good Job!
I'm unable to record the accomplishment of your Telegram Bounty. You need to follow our group. Please do it and check again. Use /support to explain us your situation, we will try to help
Join our Discord Channel, https://discord.gg/qEH8PHk, and send us your user name. You will have to stay with us till the end of the year!
You earned your Discords bounty. Good Job!

I'm unable to record the accomplishment of your Discords Bounty. You need to join our Discord Channel (https://discord.gg/qEH8PHk). Please do it and check again or use /support to explain us your situation, we will try to help

Make a good BitcoinTalk post about Hyperloot project min 100characters and input the link to our ANN thread. Send me url on your post to be qualifed. (example https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=11111.msg37611263#msg37611263
I'll got this! You earn your BitcoinTalk bounty soon as we moderate your accomplishment. Thank you!
You need to submit url link into your post. Please do it and check again or use /support to explain us your situation, we will try to help
Subscribe HyperLoot sub-reddit account and stay with us till the end of the year to earn 2 HLT. For accomplishment send me your reddit username
I'll got this! You earn your Reddit bounty soon as we moderate your accomplishment. Thank you!
Something went wrong. Please do it again or use /support to explain us your situation, we will try to help
Do a good 1000 character blog post about Hyperloot. Include links to website, github and social media. Send me the url as a proof and make 15 HLT
I'll got this! You earn your Blog bounty soon as we moderate your accomplishment. Thank you!
Something went wrong. Please do it again or use /support to explain us your situation, we will try to help
Do a good 750 character Steemit post about Hyperloot.  include links to website, github and social media. Send me the url as a proof and make 15 HLT
I'll got this! You earn your Steemit bounty soon as we moderate your accomplishment. Thank you!
Something went wrong. Please do it again or use /support to explain us your situation, we will try to help
Make a good sub-Reddit post inside gamedev communities, min 75 characters. Need to include the link to github. Send me the url to be qualified
I'll got this! You earn your Reddit bounty soon as we moderate your accomplishment. Thank you!
Something went wrong. Please do it again or use /support to explain us your situation, we will try to help

Do a good short video about HyperLoot on Twitch or YouTube, you put links to HyperLoot website, and social media channels below the video.  send us the link for verification. After verification, you get REWARDED 100 HLT.
I'll got this! You earn your Video bounty soon as we moderate your accomplishment. Thank you!
Something went wrong. Please do it again or use /support to explain us your situation, we will try to help

if you worked for game developer for more then 2 year and you can prove that. We will reward you 50 HLT. You will need to send us the linkedin profile, and fill in application form here: https://goo.gl/forms/5YllXsVEoAh0BhvF3.

if you own a video game that qualifies for HyperLoot integration, you can earn $1000 in HLT tokens. You need to fill in the form here: https://goo.gl/forms/BtYfKpXO5Rzb5sIi2, describing your game. After integrating your game with Hyperloot through SDK, we will get Reward.
